## How to test

Provide steps to validate the change.

- [ ] Backend (if applicable): `cd backend && npm run dev`
- [ ] Frontend (if applicable): `cd frontend && npm run dev`
- [ ] Typecheck: `cd backend && npx tsc --noEmit`
